title: The Boy in the Smoke
description: A SHADES OF LONDON exclusive World Book Day story33% Dark, 33% Ghostly, 34% LondonOn a cold night, Stephen Dene went to the Eton boathouse to perform a desperate act. But someone stopped him along the way, sending his life in a new and decidedly strange direction--leading him to London, to two new friends, and to a world of shadows and mystery.
author: Maureen Johnson
